name: Death Forest
storyline: Kazuki Uchida's Motorbike breaks down while driving through Aokigahara. He must survive Yoshie, Stalker, Stranger, and UMA as he navigates the forest, collecting Items along the way so he may repair his motorbike. After he gets all the items he must ride the motorbike out of the forest. More of the story and lore is revealed about the characters as the player collects Files.
summary: Death Forest is a horror game created by Kazz. It was made in Unity. The game takes place in Aokigahara (the Suicide Forest). The aim of the game is to collect all the four Items to restart your Motorbike and escape the forest. All while surviving the four spirits that will try to kill you and conserving your flashlight's battery power.
